dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset containing over 123,000 images with annotations for object detection, segmentation, and captioning, widely used for training and evaluating image-text matching models.

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of over 31,000 images, each annotated with five corresponding sentences, used for evaluating image-text matching and retrieval tasks.
